verses.text:
Bear me on, bear me on, On thy wings of love so strong;
Till I reach the bet-ter land, Then I'll sing re-demp-tion's song.

Bear me on, bear me on, Till the jour-ney here is done;
Till I reach the shin-ing shore, Where the vic-t'ry shall be won.

Bear me on, bear me on, Till I see my Sav-ior's face;
Till I reach the ho-ly hill, Where I'll rest in per-fect peace.

chorus.text:
Bear me on, bear me on, On thy wings of love so strong;
Bear me on, bear me on, Till I reach the bet-ter land.
